name: 人际支持评估列表（12项）调查
description: 一个12项测量社会支持感知的量表。
instructions: 对于每个陈述，请选择最合适的选项。
reference: Cohen S., Mermelstein R., Kamarck T., & Hoberman, H.M. (1985). Measuring the functional components of social support. In Sarason, I.G. & Sarason, B.R. (Eds), Social support: theory, research, and applications. The Hague, Netherlands: Martinus Niijhoff.
